kpi.name: msc_400a

kpi_info.title: Failed HOs reconnected to the old channel
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the number of failed HOs reconnected to the old channel.
kpi_info.use_experience:
Could be counted also for different HO types. Suggestion: Drilling down from total level to different HO types.

LAST UPDATE: 27-02-2010
THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: MSC

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: MSC

KPI CLASS: Mobility
MEASUREMENT(S): Handover measurement part 1 (M81/51H)

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed HOs reconnected to the old channel
